thread.title: Facebook strike deal with La Liga to screen Spanish football for free… starting with the clash between Granada and Real Betis
thread.title_full: Facebook strike deal with La Liga to screen Spanish football for free… starting with the clash between Granada and Real Betis

author: jhutchinson
title: Facebook strike deal with La Liga to screen Spanish football for free… starting with the clash between Granada and Real Betis
text:
EFL BACK OF THE NET Facebook strike deal with La Liga to screen Spanish football for free… starting with the clash between Granada and Real Betis 
The Copa del Rey semi-finals were shown live on Facebook, and now the league has announced more games will be shown by JOHN HUTCHINSON
